content: 6 work next row of repeat round 1 14 more times 15 rounds in right/left rosie pattern k2 4 6 knit to end total of round leg repeat round 2 until you have completed all 7 row of the right/left rosie pattern the pattern is worked on the front of the sock only the back of the sock is worked in plain continue working as established completing stockinette charted and written instructions the right/left rosie pattern 9 times 63 are page 4 and 5 rounds in total 2 rosie socks by debbie ford heel flap from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap if you are using a contrast colour for the heel start knitting your heel in contrast yarn now round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog k 2 do not break your main coloured yarn 4 6 work next row in right/left rosie pattern across the front of sock k 2 4 6 sm turn your work so the ws is facing you you ssk k to end of round are now going to be working back and forth on the next 30 34 38 sts the remaining 30 round 2 k to m sm k 2 4 6 work next row 34 38 sts are the front of the sock and will in right/left rosie pattern across the front of be left unworked for now sock k 2 4 6 sm k to end of round row 1 ws sl1 p 29 33 37 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have decreased down to your original stitch count row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 30 34 38 with 30 34 38 sts on the back of your sock sts k to m sm this is now your bor and you can repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times remove the other st markers as you work the 14 16 18 in total next round then work row 1 once more foot heel turn continue working in established pattern until row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn the foot measures 5 cm / 2 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn having worked row 1 and 2 of the right/left rosie pattern row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 if using contrast yarn for the toes break yarn turn here and start working with your contrast colour now row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before your last turn p2tog using 1 st from each side of the gap toe p1 turn set up round k 30 34 38 pm k to end of repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been round worked round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker you will have 18 20
